: lots of games do & can run under linux
: there is a linux installer on the UT2004 cd
: you just run the installer & that's it
: 1 slight issue when installing is the CD change issue ,where the installer won't return the one disc to insert the other ,but there is an easy fix for that , let me know if you run into it !
: if you get errors installing cos of 64bit ; try putting "linux32" in front of the install command e.g. linux32 sh "linuxUT2004INSTALL.sh"
